page.title: 13THE CITY
page.content: Being on the outskirts of birmingham our area contains a lot recreation grounds. The houses are spread out and the roads are lined with trees. But however, some of these areas are under theat from constuction companies, who wa build car parks for the rapidly expanding Northfield shopping centre. If this did happen, the area would gain trade, but loss some of it's character. The Austin Leyland car factory in Longbridge is the pollutant of the air in the south Birmingham area. The leylan may be a heavy pollutant, but it also provides the most jobs in the area. After 8.00pm when the men finish work the traffic slows up in the rush hour tot home.
